resources.string: Full-featured department messaging platform for routing dispatches anywhere and getting alerts out to responders FAST!

Send and display your department"'"s dispatches on any device and monitor responder status in real-time with Response Check. Users can login and send messages within the department as well as manage their own profile to route dispatches to any device (phones, pagers, tablets, computers, televisions, etc). CodeMessaging.net specializes in bringing control of dispatching to the department and responder.

Active911 provides a host of services for smartphones, cell phones, and tablets:
 - REAL TIME monitoring of response efforts
 - LIVE mapping of your entire crew as they respond
 - Detailed report generation
 - Works on iPhone, Android, Blackberry, and more
 - 2 way messaging to provide your crew with supplemental information
